001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints;
002
003/**
004 * <p>SizingPolicy class.</p>
005 *
006 * @author GustavBW
007 * @version $Id: $Id
008 */
009public enum SizingPolicy {
010    /**
011     * Take up all available space in the element this is attached to
012     */
013    FILL_PARENT,
014    /**
015     * Take up only as much as is required for the content of this element.
016     * This is contained within the element, the element with this sizing policy, is attached to.
017     * If that too declares its sizing policy as {@link SizingPolicy#FIT_CONTENT} the behaviour will propagate upwards one layer more.
018     */
019    FIT_CONTENT;
020}
